chapter.title: Supported Eiffel Compilers
chapter.para: The classes provided in the Gobo Eiffel package should compile and work without any change on the three currently maintained Eiffel compilers: ISE Eiffel, SmartEiffel and Visual Eiffel. In order to make things easier, only the latest public release of each compiler will be supported. This latest release can be a beta version provided that it is deemed stable enough, as it is often the case for SmartEiffel for example.
